a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Figure illustrates educational attainment (average years of total education) versus productivity (GDP per hour

Average years of education of 15-64 year old youth and adults
(years)

Productivity: output per hour worked
(international-$ in 2017 prices per hour)
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021); Barro and Lee (2015); Lee and Lee (2016)
Note: Data for educational attainment for the years before 2015 are estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections.
